item.description:
Al Aiello will join us this coming Thursday March 14th at our monthly meeting in Rockland at the Holiday Inn

and Friday Morning March 15th from 9am-1pm for an in depth seminar (next door at the Best Western) in Rockland

 

Each year at this time we have our fellow investor,  entity and tax strategist Al Aiello fly in from Philadelphia to share with us his years of experience to properly structure and maximize your business and personal income. I cannot stress enough the importance of the information that Al has to share with us. DO NOT miss this opportunity to learn from one of the most respected authorities in his field.

You may recognize some of these Real Estate investors that utilize Al’s strategies within their own business models, they include: Dave Lindahl, Paul Esajian, Than Merrill, Lou Brown, Jeff Taylor and Alan Cowgill…..just to name a few…….many of our members have implemented Al’s techniques and have found huge savings and protection through proper structure of their own business models.

 

Whether you are just getting started or have been investing in real estate for years, you can undoubtedly benefit from Al’s knowledge and experience.

EasternMass REIA is organized by John Ingram and Diane Annen-Benson.  More info at http://www.easternmassreia.com/
item.name: EasternMA REIA - Rockland
